entry.title: Shell Script - Notifying When Directory Change
entry.content:
Once, I have been need monitory a directory that would notify me when your status modified. Was then that I did create the a script shell that help me in this job

To do it, I used the stat utilitary Linux, that display file or file system status.

Above, I show you like this works:

#!/bin/bash

LTIME=`stat -c %Z .`

while true
do
        ATIME=`stat -c %Z .`

        if [[ "$ATIME" != "$LTIME" ]]
        then

done
